title: It's a TRAP! Task-Redirecting Agent Persuasion Benchmark for Web Agents
summary: Web-based agents powered by large language models are increasingly used for tasks such as email management or professional networking. Their reliance on dynamic web content, however, makes them vulnerable to prompt injection attacks: adversarial instructions hidden in interface elements that persuade the agent to divert from its original task.
